professionalSummery: 7 years of cross-platform experience in basic systems administration and hardware and networking, Personable and knowledgeable IT support technician with over 2 years of experience assisting customers with various hardware and software-related issues. Provided in-depth technical support to clients at a Tier 1 level, solving 99.1% of issues without transferring to Tier 2 support.

employmentHistry.describeAndResponsibilities: Deeply Recognise the needs, concerns, and questions of the client. Follow the case status and specifics of client complaints. By using remote support, provide them with the quickest resolution. Additionally, track those records and escalate the case to the concerned team. Remote support is provided by the programme (AnyDesk, TeamViewer, Rescue). By asking customers about their problems in depth and finding solutions, companies may diagnose, fix, and resolve problems. Create a connection of trust with our clients so they may listen to our worries. And on occasion, I educated them about the product and clarified that problem. Fast response and client satisfaction are primary priorities.

Additionally, Sophos firewall and antivirus software installation, maintenance, troubleshooting, and support for all computer hardware, software, and networks. Internet, LAN, and cabling configuration.

**Control end user access rights, permissions, and accounts. Five branch offices receive remote help. installing, configuring, and administering software.Installation and setup of workstations for an IP/IPX-based LAN.* Looking at a problem with the internal network. examining more than 100 systems.* Network setup management and troubleshooting, including punching and crimping.* Controlling a CCTV surveillance system. control the video conferencing.* Setting up and managing the McAfee Console. serving a year as a cashier in a department shop in Kannan.
